author: bago
msg: Made TestManager not directly instantiable (private constructor) like the ComparatorManager.

author: olegk
msg: Partial support for NTLM authentication. NTLM auth scheme must be provided with a concrete implementation NTLMEngine interface in order to work. Documentation to follow.
